Metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7567 affecting package openslp for versions less than 2.0.0-26
Metadata.Description: CVE-2016-7567 affecting package openslp for versions less than 2.0.0-26. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openslp is earlier than 2.0.0-26, affected by CVE-2016-7567
